text: Xintiandi was built in 2001 in Shanghai,China.It nears Huaihai Road, and there are many office buildings around. Before 21 century, there was an old community, and it became a modern business district after the transformation in 2001. It covers an area of 30,000 square meters. After the transformation, some Chinese stars, artists and businessmen have opened luxury stores and restaurants here. Category:Shanghai
title: Xintiandi
